channel.title: ░▒[Best Economy*] Core 732 [A Must See!]▒░
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gpAte.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fs7og.png[/img][url=http://coregaming.eu/]Website[/URL] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://coregaming.eu/forums/]Core Forums[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QdOe3.png[/img][url=http://play-core.net76.net/]Play now[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QdOe3.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/88854215/webclient.jar]Downloadable Client[/url]
[CENTER]Updates[/CENTER] [code] 10/13/2012 New features: Voting System: [url=http://www.coregaming.eu/vote/]CoreRSPS - Voting[/url] (::reward - ingame) 735 Cache: New godwars, godswords, maps etc. (removed again due to we need to dump more xteas) ::skilling (npc teleports you to all skilling areas upon CoreRSPS) ::bosses (npc teleports you to all boses upon CoreRSPS) ::minigames (npc teleports you to all minigames upon CoreRSPS) Mandrith at home (npc teleports you to monsters) Money pouch reworks Group vengence Multi boss, Lucien (#1 boss on CoreRSPS, can be found at ::bosses) New starter system (2 starters per ip) Glacors (at ::glacors) Revenants - DANGER (at ::revenants) Grotworms (at ::grotworms General store (at home northeast) New client (download on forums & webclient) This is the updates for now, there will be more to come.
New objectives: Slayer (60% dialogue is being worked on) Dungeoneering (10% floors made, DP pts made) Trade (x) (0%) Farming (0%) Construction (30% done) Polypore dungeon (5% added npcs) Notes system
12/01/2012 Mage/Ranged in Dungeoneering Recipe for Disaster (gloves) Zombie Minigame (at pest control) Cage Minigame (at pest control) Cook Assistant (quest) Polypore Dungeon Glacors (optimized)
10/25/2012 Yet we have accomplished to almost finish the dungeoneering, and it is trainable at the moment.
How does it look, what features? Floors (1-4) - 2nd floor = 40 dung, 3rd floor = 60 dung, 4th floor = 80 dung. You start with 280k coins where you can buy pickaxes, weapons etc from shops. Point system - A point system based on killing the floor guardians which gives you a certain amount of points each kill. (::checkdp) Overload system - Overloads can be bought in shop and used on the "Water through" next to the anvils. (96 herblore required)
10/15/2012 Today I have added some features to slayer (a more advanced system). The system is built on tasks and masters with a upgrading of masters system. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2w5nf5u.png[/IMG]
14/10/2012 100% Slayer with dialogues and Enchanted Gem (spria at home) 70% dungeoneering, fixing region creation. Slayertower (Slayer level req) [/code]
[CENTER][size=18pt]Media[/size][/CENTER]
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/d6d1acf7b6a2a50dfe39ff62f39129a0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/646c0ef9d129bffb811ea6445d000c82.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/a5245f146468fc8418b4a5f5a25d0063.png[/img]

[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/a00a5f2c48a757a5c7207fbd5496635a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/e6f56d3e8b359d27052d4eb0a227e2de.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/f7a23e2487d7d753abac160eabbf1f6d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/2ca914ca6f3331be987b780e031de9f0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/32b90b1dbc845a5b7c3345e33faa7c3f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/4a14a0f19efceb61fb1ed32e2d39218a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/2930899ecd49d932974118804c2d1945.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/b9fb26f694a3c48654ade1ce653b1ee2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/936d3a7322c20177561132a4dec05c8f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/dbadd44e0394d108fc2b4cd05fde1bee.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.picstation.net/pictures/b937ad9dba78373a1a92c1a44d813745.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14uukg0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/b7i4cx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/zv2clh.png[/img] Fully working glacors, only attack-able by Magic!
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/qs8exi.png[/img] All animations and gfx's are correctly added. [/CENTER]

item.title: ░▒[Best Economy*] Core 732 [A Must See!]▒░
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[CENTER]

Website
Core Forums
Play now
Downloadable Client

[CENTER]Updates[/CENTER]

10/13/2012
New features:
Voting System: [url=http://www.coregaming.eu/vote/]CoreRSPS - Voting[/url] (::reward - ingame)
735 Cache: New godwars, godswords, maps etc. (removed again due to we need to dump more xteas)
::skilling (npc teleports you to all skilling areas upon CoreRSPS)
::bosses (npc teleports you to all boses upon CoreRSPS)
::minigames (npc teleports you to all minigames upon CoreRSPS)
Mandrith at home (npc teleports you to monsters)
Money pouch reworks
Group vengence
Multi boss, Lucien (#1 boss on CoreRSPS, can be found at ::bosses)
New starter system (2 starters per ip)
Glacors (at ::glacors)
Revenants - DANGER (at ::revenants)
Grotworms (at ::grotworms
General store (at home northeast)
New client (download on forums & webclient)
This is the updates for now, there will be more to come.

New objectives:
Slayer (60% dialogue is being worked on)
Dungeoneering (10% floors made, DP pts made)
Trade (x) (0%)
Farming (0%)
Construction (30% done)
Polypore dungeon (5% added npcs)
Notes system

12/01/2012
Mage/Ranged in Dungeoneering
Recipe for Disaster (gloves)
Zombie Minigame (at pest control)
Cage Minigame (at pest control)
Cook Assistant (quest)
Polypore Dungeon
Glacors (optimized)

10/25/2012
Yet we have accomplished to almost finish the dungeoneering, and it is trainable at the moment.

How does it look, what features?
Floors (1-4) - 2nd floor = 40 dung, 3rd floor = 60 dung, 4th floor = 80 dung.
You start with 280k coins where you can buy pickaxes, weapons etc from shops.
Point system - A point system based on killing the floor guardians which gives you a certain amount of points each kill. (::checkdp)
Overload system - Overloads can be bought in shop and used on the "Water through" next to the anvils. (96 herblore required)

10/15/2012
Today I have added some features to slayer (a more advanced system).
The system is built on tasks and masters with a upgrading of masters system.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2w5nf5u.png[/IMG]

14/10/2012
100% Slayer with dialogues and Enchanted Gem (spria at home)
70% dungeoneering, fixing region creation.
Slayertower (Slayer level req)

[CENTER][size=18pt]Media[/size][/CENTER]

[CENTER]


Fully working glacors, only attack-able by Magic!


All animations and gfx’s are correctly added.
[/CENTER]
